Posts.EditableText: Im trying to setup my own server quest says: [quote:1s6wfrk7]Waiting for responce[/quote:1s6wfrk7] why? can anyone help?
Posts.HTML:
Im trying to setup my own server quest says:

Waiting for responce


why?
can anyone help?

Posts.EditableText: Make sure QuestNet Server is running and that you have started a game on it. Then ensure you have entered the correct IP address (or name e.g. "localhost") and port number.
Posts.HTML: Make sure QuestNet Server is running and that you have started a game on it. Then ensure you have entered the correct IP address (or name e.g. "localhost") and port number.
